title: John Grisham - earnings 2010 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Earnings in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Months.
Month May 2011 to May 2012 has the highest Earnings in million U.S. dollars and June 2016 to June 2017 has the lowest Earnings in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Earnings in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Earnings in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Months.
The maximum Earnings in million U.S. dollars 26.0 is found at Month May 2011 to May 2012 and the minimum is found at June 2016 to June 2017 where Month is 14.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Earnings in million U.S. dollars for 8 number of Months.
Month May 2011 to May 2012 has the highest Earnings in million U.S. dollars and June 2016 to June 2017 has the lowest Earnings in million U.S. dollars.

max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Earnings in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Earnings in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month May 2011 to May 2012 and lowest at Month June 2016 to June 2017.
Month June 2017 to June 2018 has the second highest value for Earnings in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Earnings in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.

The Month May 2011 to May 2012 has the highest Earnings in million U.S. dollars, followed by June 2017 to June 2018, and May 2010 to April 2011. Down to the Month June 2016 to June 2017 which is the lowest.
Overall Earnings in million U.S. dollars has reduced over the Months.
Month June 2015 to June 2016, June 2012 to June 2013, and May 2010 to April 2011 have a similar Earnings in million U.S. dollars that is 18.0.
The Month May 2011 to May 2012 has 1.42 times more Earnings in million U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 146.0.
